project_metadata.musical_style: Cinematic electronic-organic hybrid with Studio Ghibli warmth
project_metadata.educational_context: Introduction to algorithms, automation, digital economy basics

episode_narrative_summary.arc: Introduce Luna's isolated digital world → Show her automated systems working → Hint at human cost of isolation → Spark of possibility
episode_narrative_summary.teaching_goal: Demystify algorithms and automation; introduce concept that code affects real people
episode_narrative_summary.emotional_journey: Impressive competence → Subtle loneliness → Moment of connection → Hopeful uncertainty
key_moments: 00:45-02:30: Montage of automated systems working (teach concept)

master_track_specification.overall_structure: Intro (mechanical) → Development (layering humanity) → Contemplation (vulnerability) → Outro (hopeful uncertainty)
master_track_specification.key: C Major (hopeful) with brief excursions to A Minor (loneliness)
master_track_specification.tempo: Variable: 80 BPM intro, builds to 120 BPM during montage, slows to 90 BPM for contemplation
master_track_specification.instrumentation_philosophy: Hybrid analog-digital: Piano represents Luna's humanity, synth pads represent digital world, subtle strings represent suppressed emotions, light electronic glitches represent code/algorithms
instrumentation: Solo piano (primary melodic voice - Luna's inner self)
Digital glitch elements (code sounds, very subtle)

section_breakdown.emotional_tone: Competent but detached, routine, slightly cold efficiency
section_breakdown.musical_direction: Sparse piano notes, electronic pad underneath, minimalist. Represents Luna's isolated morning routine. Music feels 'smart' but not 'warm' yet.
section_breakdown.special_notes: Piano plays repeating pattern (like algorithm loop), synth pad has slight digital texture. No strings yet - she's disconnected from emotion.

scenes_covered: S04-S12: Various automated systems making money, helping users
section_breakdown.emotional_tone: Impressive, energetic, satisfying (code working), increasing complexity
section_breakdown.musical_direction: Tempo increases to 120 BPM. Piano becomes more intricate (ascending arpeggios). Synth layers add complexity. Light percussion enters. Represents multiple systems running in harmony. Should feel exciting but also mechanical.
section_breakdown.special_notes: This is 'teaching music' - clear, bright, helping viewer understand how automation works. Each new system adds a musical layer (visual metaphor). Peak at 02:00 when all systems shown working together.

scenes_covered: S15: Luna at laptop during meal
section_breakdown.emotional_tone: Warm family atmosphere contrasted with Luna's emotional distance, subtle sadness
section_breakdown.musical_direction: Tempo slows to 95 BPM. Strings enter for first time (cello, representing family warmth). Piano melody becomes less algorithmic, more human. But there's dissonance - Luna's digital world (synth) clashes gently with family warmth (strings). Key shifts briefly to A Minor during Luna's isolation moment.
section_breakdown.key: C Major shifting to A Minor (02:45-03:15) then back
section_breakdown.special_notes: Strings represent family connection Luna is missing. When she ignores them for laptop, strings fade slightly, synth pad returns - visual representation of her choice. Not judgmental music, but emotionally clear.

section_breakdown.section_name: First Human Connection - Spark of Possibility
section_breakdown.musical_direction: Piano plays softer, more contemplative melody. Strings return warmly (representing human connection in the message). Synth pad remains but becomes warmer, less mechanical. A new melodic motif emerges (will become 'connection theme'). Music asks a question rather than stating - represents Luna's uncertainty.
section_breakdown.special_notes: This is the emotional turn. Music should feel like a door opening slightly. The 'connection theme' (simple ascending three notes on strings) appears at 04:45 when Luna reads how her system helped reunite a family. This motif will return in future episodes.

scenes_covered: S19: Luna looks at family photo
section_breakdown.emotional_tone: Thoughtful, vulnerable, hopeful but uncertain, open-ended
section_breakdown.musical_direction: Piano and strings in balance (digital and human in harmony). Tempo stays at 90 BPM but rhythm becomes less rigid. 'Connection theme' returns, slightly developed. Music doesn't resolve completely - ends on a question (suspended chord) rather than firm conclusion. Represents Luna's uncertainty but also possibility.
section_breakdown.key: C Major, ending on suspended fourth chord (unresolved)
section_breakdown.special_notes: Final 15 seconds (06:30-06:45) is gentle fade with 'connection theme' lingering. Not triumphant, not sad - contemplative. Sets up emotional continuity for Episode 2. Music should feel like an inhale before a choice.

master_track_specification.ai_generation_prompt_suno: Cinematic educational underscoring, 6 minutes 45 seconds. Opening: sparse solo piano with ambient electronic pad, 80 BPM, C Major, mechanical but intelligent. 0:45 mark: tempo builds to 120 BPM, piano arpeggios ascend, electronic layers add, light percussion, represents automation working, energetic and satisfying, teaching-friendly clarity. 2:30 mark: tempo slows to 95 BPM, warm cello and violin enter, emotional depth increases, brief shift to A Minor (2:45-3:15) showing isolation, then return to C Major. 4:00 mark: tempo 90 BPM, contemplative piano melody, strings supportive, synth becomes warmer, intimate and vulnerable, new three-note ascending motif on strings (connection theme). 5:30 to end: piano and strings balanced, rhythm less rigid, connection theme returns developed, ends on suspended fourth chord (unresolved, hopeful uncertainty), gentle fade. Overall: Studio Ghibli warmth meets intelligent electronic, hybrid analog-digital, suitable for young adult tech education, no vocals, emotional but not manipulative, seamless transitions between sections.
master_track_specification.ai_generation_prompt_udio: 6:45 cinematic score, educational content background music. Hybrid electronic-acoustic: solo piano (primary), ambient synth pads (secondary), cello and violin (emotional layer), subtle electronic glitches. Structure: Intro (sparse, mechanical 80 BPM) → Energetic montage (120 BPM, layered, ascending patterns) → Emotional turn (95 BPM, strings enter, warmth vs isolation) → Contemplative close (90 BPM, balanced, unresolved ending). C Major with A Minor excursion. Warm Studio Ghibli aesthetic, intelligent but not cold, hopeful but uncertain. Teaching-appropriate clarity, no lyrics.

scene_01.description: Luna wakes up in cramped bedroom, surrounded by monitors showing code and crypto charts

music_requirements.emotional_tone: Mysterious morning energy, competent routine, slightly detached
music_requirements.theme: Introduction - no full theme yet, establishing mood

sync_points.music_action: Single piano note (C)
Synth pad swells slightly

scene_01.dialogue_text: [VO] In a country where money evaporates overnight...

scene_02.description: Close-ups of monitors showing Luna's automated systems: crypto trading bot with profits, content generation AI, price arbitrage algorithm
scene_02.teaching_moment: Visual introduction to automated systems - viewer sees multiple monitors with different bots working

music_requirements.emotional_tone: Impressive competence, satisfying 'it's working' feeling, intelligent
music_requirements.theme: Early algorithm motif - repeating pattern representing automated loop

sync_points.music_action: Piano plays ascending three notes
Subtle upward piano flourish

scene_02.dialogue_text: [VO] ...I built machines that make it appear.

scene_03.description: Luna makes coffee in tiny kitchen, glances at family photos on wall, returns to monitors

music_requirements.emotional_tone: Brief human moment, but still detached - routine

sync_points.music_action: Piano plays single sustained note (hint of emotion)
Synth pad returns, music beginning to build toward montage

scene_04_to_12.description: TEACHING MONTAGE: Visual breakdown of Luna's automated systems helping users. Crypto trading for family savings, content generation AI creating educational materials, price arbitrage helping people buy food cheaper, medicine coordination, skill exchange platform. Each system shown working, with quick explanation.
scene_04_to_12.teaching_moment: PRIMARY TEACHING SECTION - Explains algorithms, automation, digital economy, how code helps real people

music_requirements.emotional_tone: Energetic, impressive, satisfying, educational clarity, building complexity
music_requirements.theme: Algorithm Montage - represents multiple systems working in harmony

sound_effects.note: SFX sparse during montage - music carries energy, specific SFX punctuate key moments

sync_points.music_action: Tempo reaches 120 BPM, percussion enters
Add synth layer
Strings hint briefly (foreshadowing human element)
Peak complexity - all instruments playing, impressive but organized

sync_points.event: Transition: focus shifts to one user's face (grateful)
sync_points.music_action: Music begins to simplify, preparing for emotional shift

scene_04_to_12.dialogue_text: [VO] Multiple explanations of technical concepts, but music doesn't duck - VO mixed clearly over music
scene_04_to_12.mixing_note: Voice-over should be clear (high pass filter on music during VO) but music maintains energy

scene_13.description: Abuela (grandmother) cooking traditional meal in kitchen, humming, warm atmosphere

music_requirements.emotional_tone: Warm, familial, contrasts with digital world, human texture
music_requirements.theme: Family warmth - strings represent analog human connection

sync_points.event: Camera transitions from Luna's screens to grandmother
sync_points.music_action: Strings (cello) enter for first time - major emotional shift
Piano melody becomes more human, less pattern-based

scene_14.description: Family dinner: Mother, Father, Grandmother, Uncle at table. Luna arrives late, immediately pulls out laptop. Family exchanges looks but says nothing.
scene_14.teaching_moment: Emotional teaching: Show cost of digital isolation, family dynamics

music_requirements.emotional_tone: Bittersweet - family warmth vs Luna's absence, gentle sadness without judgment
music_requirements.theme: Isolation revealed - synth vs strings tension

sync_points.event: Luna opens laptop at dinner table
sync_points.music_action: Key shifts to A Minor, strings fade slightly, synth pad becomes more prominent - represents her choosing digital over family
Cello plays sustained melancholy note

sync_points.event: Family continues dinner without Luna's engagement
sync_points.music_action: Strings and synth in gentle dissonance - both present, not harmonizing

scene_14.dialogue_text: Brief family small talk (Spanish/Spanglish), Luna's distracted 'mm-hmm' responses

scene_15.description: Post-dinner: Luna alone at desk, family cleaning kitchen in background (out of focus). Luna checks systems, sees increasing user numbers. Brief satisfaction, then back to emptiness.
scene_15.teaching_moment: Emotional: Success without connection is hollow

music_requirements.emotional_tone: Empty success, hollow victory, quiet loneliness
music_requirements.theme: Isolation complete - return to digital emptiness

sync_points.event: Luna returns to desk, family behind her
sync_points.music_action: Return to C Major but feels emptier now
Brief upward piano notes (satisfaction)
Piano returns to sparse, isolated notes
Music pauses briefly - moment of anticipation

scene_16_to_18.description: Luna receives message from network user - not just thanks, but personal story. Family reunited because of medicine coordination. Attached photo of family embracing. Luna reads, visibly affected. First crack in her armor.
scene_16_to_18.teaching_moment: EMOTIONAL CORE: Code affects real people, algorithms serve humans, connection matters

music_requirements.theme: CONNECTION THEME first appearance - three ascending notes on strings, will recur in future episodes

sync_points.music_action: Piano plays new, questioning motif
Strings enter softly (first time since family scene - connection returning)
Strings play CONNECTION THEME (three ascending notes) - this is THE moment
Piano and strings in harmony (digital and human balanced)
CONNECTION THEME developed, fuller orchestration
Music sustains, doesn't resolve - question posed

scene_16_to_18.dialogue_text: [VO] Message text read aloud (warm, grateful voice) - user's story
scene_16_to_18.mixing_note: Voice-over should feel like it's part of the music - intimate, not separate

scene_19_to_22.description: Luna looks at family photo on wall. Then at her screens. Then at both. Sees family asleep in living room. Contemplates. Episode ends with her at window, city lights below, uncertainty but possibility.
scene_19_to_22.teaching_moment: Thematic: Technology serves people, not replaces them. Question posed, not answered.

music_requirements.theme: CONNECTION THEME returns, developed. Balance of digital and human. Unresolved ending.
music_requirements.dynamic: Soft, gentle fade over final 30 seconds

sync_points.music_action: Strings warm
Piano responds
Strings and piano in harmony
CONNECTION THEME returns, more developed
Music doesn't fully resolve - ends on suspended fourth chord (question, possibility)
Gentle fade, CONNECTION THEME motif lingers as last element

scene_19_to_22.mixing_note: Final 15 seconds should fade naturally, not hard cut. CONNECTION THEME (three notes on strings) should be last audible element before silence.

eq_guidelines.music_during_vo: High-pass filter at 200Hz to clear vocal range

production_notes.sora_generation_approach: Generate video with NO audio or minimal ambient sound only. All music and SFX added in post.
production_notes.music_source_decision: PRIMARY: AI generate using Suno prompt provided. BACKUP: Source similar copyright-free track using search keywords.
production_notes.sfx_source_priority: 1. Freesound.org (free), 2. Custom foley recording, 3. BBC Sound Effects (free), 4. Epidemic Sound (subscription)
production_notes.sync_workflow: 1. Generate/source music master track, 2. Gather all SFX, 3. Edit video in DaVinci Resolve or Premiere, 4. Mix audio with video using sync points, 5. Master to -14 LUFS.

continuity_notes_for_series.connection_theme: Three ascending notes on strings (D-E-G in C Major). First appears 04:45, episode 1. Will recur in episodes when Luna experiences human connection. Should develop and expand across series.
continuity_notes_for_series.lunas_theme: Piano-based, ascending arpeggios, represents her intelligence and growth. Currently mechanical, will become more expressive across episodes.
continuity_notes_for_series.instrumentation_evolution: Episode 1: Sparse, mechanical. Later episodes will add: full orchestra (community), guitar (Mateo), percussion (energy), maintaining piano/strings/synth core.
continuity_notes_for_series.emotional_palette: Established C Major (hope) and A Minor (isolation). Future episodes may explore other keys for different emotional states.
